thread.title: Levi’s Introduces New SS17 “Unisex for Everyone” Line 8 Collection
thread.title_full: Levi’s Introduces New SS17 “Unisex for Everyone” Line 8 Collection

author: Jonathan Sawyer
title: Levi’s Introduces New SS17 “Unisex for Everyone” Line 8 Collection
text:
Visit the original post to see all 10 images from this gallery. 
Today marks the release of Levi’s new SS17 Line 8 collection, a range of progressive, streetwear-driven styles inspired by the young and rebellious. For the first time ever, however, the delivery also welcomes a selection of goods that are “unisex for everyone,” comprised of tops and bottoms made and styled for both genders.
The unisex array includes the Unisex for Everyone Jacket, a play on the iconic Type I Trucker that has been modernized with minimal pockets and a squared-off androgynous silhouette in a stretch twill fabric, a slim jean, and the Line 8 classic tee with an updated open collar and boxy fit.
Alongside the unisex assortment, the men’s offerings include a new boardshort in a tropical print, and new trouser short and skinny jeans, offered in contemporary washes like acid blacks, bright indigos, and shades of white.
You can go ahead and shop Levi’s SS17 Line 8 collection online .
